Jade Armor

armor (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 234
armor id [armor]: 107 (Jade Scale Armor)
protection, body [protbody]: 16
defence [def]: -1
encumbrance [enc]: 4
national discount [nationrebate]: #52 MA T'ien Ch'i - Imperial Bureaucracy
(quickness [quick])

Requires 10W5E to forge (W2E1)

A heavy scale mail composed of small bits of jade stone. The enchantment of the armor quickens the wearer and increases his defensive capabilities. The weight of the armor can be a problem in prolonged battles.
